amendment.description: To provide additional funding for child care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2937 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 78 - 20. Record Vote Number: 64.

action.text: Amendment SA 2937 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S3260, S3273-3274) To provide additional funding for child care.
